document.full_text: egyptians vote on saturday in a referendum on constitutional changes that are designed to allow free and fair elections but have splintered the reform movement that toppled hosni mubarak.
document.title: sharp divide in egyptian vote on constitution
lines_and_colors: egyptians vote on saturday in a referendum on constitutional changes that are designed to allow free and fair elections but have splintered the reform movement that toppled hosni mubarak.
